name: Obelisks
description:
You are awake. You are alive. But your eyes are no longer yours. Instead, you must rely on the ancient Obelisks to see, placed there by the ancestors who built your tomb centuries ago. Push blocks and solve mazes to make your way to the freedom and afterlife that awaits you. And beware: some things in this tomb know when they are being watched...

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys / WASD - Move Character
  • Click - Switch Active Obelisk
  • Space / Right Shift - Interact (grab/drop blocks, flip switches)

Proudly presented by Vladimir Ermoshkin, Hans Jorgensen, and Matthew Staehely of the Paul Allen School of Computer Science of Engineering, of the University of Washington. Enjoy.
